channel.title: Feature Board on Micro-Studios
channel.description: Recent content in Feature Board on Micro-Studios

item.title: N1 Board
item.description: N1 FreeRTOS, WIFI, Bluetooth, JTAG, LVGL Development Board The N1 board is developed by Michael HU for his FreeRTOS, WIFI, Bluetooth, JTAG and LVGL Lessons. The board based ESP32S3 16MB flash, 8MB ram module. It has the features as follows: It has one 2.54 inch, 240x320 resolution TFT true color LCD. It has two joysticks, eight normal gpio keys, one reset key and one boot key. It wires out the 32 GPIO pins, TXD pin and RXD pin from the module.

item.title: N2 Board
item.description: N2 FreeRTOS, WIFI, Bluetooth, JTAG, LVGL Development Board The N2 board is developed by Michael HU for his FreeRTOS, WIFI, Bluetooth, JTAG and LVGL Lessons. The board based ESP32S3 16MB flash, 8MB ram module. It has the features as follows: It has one 1.28 inch circle TFT true color LCD. The circle LCD has lots of important applications for instrument devices or smart watch. The LVGL lesson will explain how to use “Scale widgets” in detail for circle LCD to design projects.
